system.requirement: Your snake is silent and deadly.

abilities.description: Poison: Once per fight, when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} alongside your snake and score a strong hit, inflict 1 harm after resolving the next X moves where X is result of your action die.

Hypnotize: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by having your snake weave hypnotically, roll +shadow. On a strong hit, you have the initiative after the next move regardless of the outcome.
Squeeze: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +iron by having your snake constrict the limbs of a foe of formidable or less, add +2.

exclusiveOptions.name: Treat a weak hit as a miss on all abilities.
